author: malcolm
msg: Followup to r26432: inline a short helper function into the only caller.

author: kfogel
msg: (get_merged_path_revisions): Decrement the revnum, not the path
pointer (oops!), when obtaining mergeinfos for comparison.

author: vgeorgescu
msg: Fix a couple of problems with depth upgrades when the anchor of the
editor is not also the target.
(update_entry): Calling is_depth_upgrade() here is wrong.  Use a special
check instead to determine if we're dealing with a depth upgrade.
(complete_directory): Determine the target of the operation by looking at
eb->target instead of checking the is_root_dir variable.
(depth_update_to_more_depth): Extend the test to upgrade the depth of a
subdirectory of the working copy root.

author: lgo
msg: ra_serf: some more cleaning up of abort() calls.
(fetch_file): make function return an svn_error_t *. Replace abort() calls
(end_report): handle error now returned by fetch_file.

author: malcolm
msg: Remove the unused (uncallable) txn vtable entry 'get_mergeinfo', originally
(txn_vtable): Remove reference to svn_fs_fs__txn_mergeinfo (which is used
elsewhere, and which will be fixed up in a following commit).
